paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Trichoclusia
Soós 1962a : 135
. Type species,
Trichoclusia sabroskyi Soós 1962
, by original designation. Gender feminine.
Soós 1964a : 5
[key], 1968: 8 [catalogue, Americas south of USA ];
Lonsdale & Marshall 2006a : 168
[as synonym of
Chaetoclusia
].

Chaetoclusiella
Soós 1962a : 138
. Type species,
Chaetoclusiella richardfreyi Soós 1962
, by original designation. Gender feminine.
Soós 1964a : 5
[key], 1968: 3 [catalogue, Americas south of USA ];
Lonsdale & Marshall 2006a : 168
[as synonym of
Chaetoclusia
].

350m .
